0100100111011001 0110101101010001 1 -> sum: 1011010100101011, cout: 0
1001010110110011 0110000100110100 1 -> sum: 1111011011101000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
